mapper.sql: id, order_id, order_task_id, work_record_inst_id, tool_type_id, tool_id, measure, amount, lack

sql.trim: #{item.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderTaskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.workRecordInstId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.toolTypeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.toolId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.measure, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.amount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.lack, jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: select t.*, t1.name, t1.kind, t1.code, t3.serial_no, t3.asset_code, t1.unit, t1.price, t1.price * t.amount AS sumPrice, t1.category1, t1.category2, t5.title as workRecordInstName from bu_work_order_tool t left join bu_material_type t1 on t1.id = t.tool_type_id left join bu_material_tools t3 on t3.id = t.tool_id left join bu_pl_work_record t4 on t4.id = t.work_record_inst_id left join bu_work_record t5 on t5.id = t4.form_obj_id where t.order_task_id = #{workOrderTaskId}
